column4: I have a friend who had one partition with ubuntu and one with windows XP, and he just removed the ubuntu-partition and got error in grub becuse grub read from the ubuntu-partition he just removed, what is the easiest solution if he only wants to run windows?
Is there any way to reinstall the windows boot loader to mbr, or should he reinstall grub?
run 'fixmbr' from the recovery console on the xp install disk
